Urbane, Illinois
Dear Harry:
At the Columbus meeting of the Board, 1 believe that a motion
was passed directing you to find out from the Educational Radio
and Television Center whether they would be prepared to pay
half the cost of the token payment for addition BBC programs.
I believe, also* that you were supposed to check the memberÂ¬
ship as to the number who were willing to contribute toward
the other half. I do not recall as to whether there was any action
to be taken by the International Relations Committee and I am,
therefore, writing to you for advice. One, as to whether or not
you have checked with Harry Newburn and the member stations
of NAEB and whether there is any action for me to take.
With all best wishes, believe me.
As ever.
May 12
Seymour N. Siegel
Director, WNYC
